Feb 24 (Reuters) - Anglo American PLC AAL.L:: *JSE: AGL - SUMMARISED PRELIMINARY FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2021 AND NOTICE OF DIVIDEND *ANGLO AMERICAN - FY UNDERLYING EBITDA* OF $20.6 BILLION: STRONG DEMAND AND PRICES *ANGLO AMERICAN - FY BASIC HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $7.00


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 24-FEB-202207:01:01.297 GMT
